Song.Title: ALLELUIA
Song.Lyrics:
Refrain: Alleluia, alleluia, alleluiaâ€¦
1: Your words, O Lord, are spirit and life; You have the words of everlasting life. [Refrain]
2: Your words, O Lord, give joy to my heart; Your teaching is light to my eyes. [Refrain]
3: I wait for the Lord, my soul waits for His word. [Refrain]
